column5: Wow!!! YK has been busy with celebs this week!!! Last weekend Rick Mercer was here filming with the Ice Pilots crew, then yesterday Mike Holmes was here speaking and helping present awards and lastly at tomorrows Memorial Classic hokey game between the RCMP & YKFD Gordie & Marty Howe will be there.
Ya but it is still as cold as a santanic woman's breast up there. BRRRRRRRR
Currently -7 here with 8kmh winds. Not too cold at all Albert. Warmer than your -6 with 26kmh winds.
*Hangs head and kicks the ground sheepishly*
My sis and her son met Mike. Class act guy.Even tucked his cig behind his bac for the pic. Sry I dont have it.
Breaks up the boredom of a YK winter I suppose.

Sour grapes perhaps but - we left Yellowknife/NWT in 1997 after five years of minus 40 setting in just before Christmas, staying that way until it warmed up to -20 in March (and everyone went around with their parkas open to enjoy the warmth) then when it went up to -10 or so in May, it was time to get a few outdoor things done.  I used to curse Whitehorse for the good temps over there, but looks like the last few years in Yellowknife has been pretty good as well! (sorry to hear Caribou Carnival is in doubt this year...)
